column4: sireorion rbunny: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RestrictedFormats/PlayingDVDs#Installing%20libdvdcss is what you need to know...
I actually didn't need to play movie DVDs at the moment, but if I do, I have bookmarked the link
Hey, I wanted to say that I'm sorry to have bothered you about DVDs. It was just surprising to me to hear about needing to install packages to play them.
